name: X-Plates
description: Für Kreuz- und Querdenker - Aufbauten mit maximaler Flexibilität

documentationAndCompliance.technicalSpecifications: Layer options: 3 or 5 layers; Density: 450 kg/m³; Outer layers perpendicular to longitudinal direction; Cover layers in non-visible quality by default; Layer notation: X=|20| indicates lamellae orientation
